thread.section_title: The Wall Street Journal & Breaking News, Business, Financial and Economic News, World News and Video
thread.title: Chicago Business Barometer Rises Slightly

author: Cara Lombardo
title: Chicago Business Barometer Rises Slightly
text:
The Chicago Business Barometer rose slightly in April, ending a three-month downward trend as firms’ operations grew for the first time this year.
“Uncertainty among suppliers appears to be assisting the upward march in prices, but the majority of firms were optimistic any negative impact stemming directly from recently implemented tariffs would be minimal,” MNI Indicators Jamie Satchi said in prepared remarks.
The...
